description:
Conan, Kogoro, and Ran witness Nichiuri Sports reporters Hashizume and Kagazumi arguing at a restaurant. Despite getting along so poorly, they`re nearly identical in every way. Later, Hashizume leaves the restaurant and accidentally takes Kagazume`s travel mug with him. That night, Kagazume`s body is found on the riverbank. The cause of death is poisoning by cyanide mixed into the coffee in his travel mug. When Hashizume`s fingerprints are found on Kagazume`s mug, he`s brought in for questioning. Hashizume claims to have an alibi, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Birds of a Feather at Loggerheads
Deux êtres semblables en perpétuel désaccord
Nitamono Doushi ga Ken`en no Naka
似た者同士が犬猿の仲
